headline.main: Patents; A Computer That Talks Back

docs.abstract: Steven I Molnar of Cooper Union Research Foundation patents apparatus for generating power at seabottom, based on great pressure of water at such levels (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 3 Industry is increasingly storing information in computer memories and would like to get it in clearly spoken words. The head of the acoustics research department at Bell Telephone Laboratories, Murray Hill, N.J., has been working to help computers clarify their speech.
